allProjects.title: Cards for Mental Health
allProjects.description: A supportive space offering guided activities, reflections, and gentle routines to build healthier mental habits each day. Tracks your progress and focuses on personal growth.

allProjects.title: ASL Recognition
allProjects.description: This ASL detection model is built on MobileNetV2, pretrained on ImageNet and fine-tuned on an ASL dataset, optimized for mobile performance, making it ideal for Snap AR.
allProjects.link: on your desktop via git clone

allProjects.title: Fake News Detector
allProjects.description: High-precision fake-news classification leveraging Cohere's state-of-the-art NLP stack. Exposes a structured Flask endpoint for credibility scoring and semantic forensics.

allProjects.title: Recify
allProjects.description: A manual song search engine that allows users to find song based on their choics using Spotify's API
